snippet: Fourteen jurors have been selected to hear the case of a 76-year-old white Milwaukee man charged with homicide in the killing of an unarmed 13-year-old black boy.
abstract: Trial begins for John Henry, 76-year-old white Milwaukee man charged with first-degree homicide in 2012 killing of black teenager Darius Simmons.
lead_paragraph: Fourteen jurors have been selected to hear the case of a 76-year-old white Milwaukee man charged with homicide in the killing of an unarmed 13-year-old black boy.

headline.main: Wisconsin: Trial Begins for White Man in Killing of a Black Teenager
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: Trial Begins For White Man In Killing of a Black Teenager
